content: how much time does the professor have to encode my grade?

The professor has **14 days** from the exam date to enter your grade into the Å IS system [1](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/education/academic-records). For example, if your exam was on 11 July 2022, the grade must be entered by 25 July 2022 [1](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/education/academic-records).

## References
[1] https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/education/academic-records
